title: Have you ever read a book that is 'Attitude is Everything'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it is one of my favorite books. Attitude is Everything by Jeff Keller: Everything starts with the right attitude. This book will make your self-belief so much strong that you will start to feel you can achieve anything in life. Attitude is the only difference that separates winners and losers. A person with the right attitude can conquer the world. How much attitude contributes to every success we achieve in our lives. This book has it all. This book is a simple short read nearly 100 pages and has wonderful quotes written which charges you to do things beyond your comfort zone. I just can’t describe more about this book. Just do read this book.  Cheers! Have a right attitude.
